description: System dashboard for pgSCV metrics (Prometheus version, pgSCV v0.9.7 edition)

panels.description: Rate of network errors (per minute) across all interfaces.
panels.title: Network errors

panels.description: Amount of available memory (including cached and buffers).
panels.title: Available memory

panels.description: Max disk space usage across all filesystems.
panels.title: Disk space usage

targets.expr: sum by (device) (rate(node_disk_time_seconds_total{instance="$instance"}[1m])) / (sum by (device) (rate(node_disk_completed_total{instance="$instance"}[1m])) + on() group_left vector(1))

title: pgSCV: System
